> Tucson lies on the bed, and waits for Stanton to hook him up to co=

ck on my word. I know I will be able to do this, and if any harm comes to m=

Good will prevail, and the light will remain forever lit. Now, let's do thi=

>
> He lies still to await hookup.

<NEW>

Santon no=
dded as he he gestured for Legacy to begin connecting Tuscon
to Rodimus.

"=
This is alien technology that is affecting Rodimus." Bump spoke up
from his=
 position next to Tuscon. "We do not know what will happen or
how this will=
 affect you or Rodimus. Be very careful."

Santon pointed to a seperate sca=
nning module, "We will be watching
your spark signature as well. If it shou=
ld dip into critical levels we
shall pull you out."

"He is ready." Legacy =
said as he connected two thick cables and
several smaller ones to Tuscon's =
power module.

Santon nodded again, "Begin."

*    *    *    *    *

<OLD>
=

> Outside in the observation room, it doesn't take Straight Shot long to s=
ee what is going on. But deep down she knew he was doing the right thing, s=
he felt it too. Night Shift could also feel what his comrade was up to, and=

ver has the same feelings as Noctorro and Bump. But Rat Trap holds onto the=
 positivity that Straight Shot and Night Shift share as well as Silverbolt.=

>

him, and holds his hand.
>

now he can. Silverbolt's right, he can do this. We have to believe he can. =
It's our belief in him that's gonna make him pull through."

 keeps a finger crossed as he stands next to Silverbolt.

t Trap chimes in.

And then maybe, just maybe we'll have something to celebrate."

<NEW>

Silv=
erbolt continued to watch the operation through the glass, his
face lightly=
 reflected in the glass was thoughtful as his optics took
in the scene. "We=
 will be victorious, because have to be." he said as
his own hand clamped d=
own. He was a soldier, a knight, who was ready
to do battle, and yet there =
was nothing to battle. He felt helpless.

Yet none of that was on his face =
as he looked back, "Sometimes all we
have is hope." he said his voice confi=
dent. "No doubt Hydras is also
using this time to consoldate his black army=
 for what ever evil scheme
he has in mind." He smiled, "But we shall be rea=
dy for him, with all
of our combined might."

He looked back at the operati=
on as Tuscon was being connected, "We
will be waiting for you when you retu=
rn." he said, his voice low.
